column1: Little Goat Diner////The best brunch I've ever had. The wait was long like most good places in Chicago (about 3 hours). Just put your name down and go about your day. There were so many good things on the menu it's really hard to choose
column2: but that also means you most likely won't make a bad choice. Recommend this place to everyone. Just a warning
column3: if you get the biscuits and gravy you might be stuffed to the brim.
